    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Menu(Renderer render)

    • Menu

      public Menu(Renderer render, int x, int y, int width, int height, int alignment)
      Creates a new menu.

      y - the y coordinate
      width - the width of the menu
      height - the height of the menu
      alignment - the alignment of the menu

      height - the height of the menu
